name: Open The Doors 101
description:
Basic Movement Buttons
W, A, S, D, Space, Left Shift, Crtl and E to Interact

This is a Game developed for 101 Jam, in collaboration with Mayra Grandra

Inspired by Classic Horror Games and including certain systems of our own to provide a different experience, we deeply hope you enjoy this Game

The second file (32bit) is a compilation for lower performance computers, if you have an optimal equipment, we recommend the original compilation, there are no more changes than the difference in threads

To avoid errors install the "UE4PrereqSetup_x86.exe" located in the folder Engine \ Extras \ Redist \ en-us
